        <script><![CDATA[/**
Service-now.com

Description: For task source expenses, determine if we should create a duplicate expense for the task's top task
Example, a project task has a top task of the project record. This allows you to easily report and allocate project expenses directly.
 **/

processTopTaskExpense();


function processTopTaskExpense() {
    //check for property

    if (gs.getProperty("glide.cost_mgmt.process_task_top_task") != "true")
        return;

    //for insert of new expense
    if (current.operation() == "insert") {
        //get source record
        var source = current.source_id.getRefRecord();
        //make sure we have a planned task with top task thats not itself
        if (source.instanceOf("planned_task") && source.top_task != "" && source.top_task != source.getUniqueValue()) {
            var fmu = new FMUtils();
            fmu.processTopTask(current);
        }
    }

    //for update of expense line
    if (current.operation() == "update") {
        //find existing top task expense
        var gr = new GlideRecord("fm_expense_line");
        gr.addQuery("base_expense", current.getUniqueValue());
        gr.addQuery('task', current.task.top_task);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            gr.setValue('amount', current.amount.getCurrencyString());
            gr.short_description = current.short_description + " (" + current.source_id.getDisplayValue() + ")";
            gr.expense_type = current.expense_type;
            gr.recalled = current.recalled;
            gr.setValue('rate_card', current.getValue('rate_card'));
            gr.setValue('expense_type', current.getValue('expense_type'));
            gr.setValue('recalled', current.getValue('recalled'));
            gr.setValue('rate_type', current.getValue('rate_type'));
            gr.setValue('expense_type', current.getValue('expense_type'));
            gr.setValue('resource_type', current.getValue('resource_type'));
            gr.update();
        }
    }

}]]></script>
